text: Asarum maximum is a species of plant in the family Aristolochiaceae. It is endemic to China. The flowers have a distinct smell of mushrooms. ==References== * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Asarum maximum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. maximum Category:Flora of China Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Asarum maximum
